main event: A civilian observer watched a white object changing to red and blue in the sky for one hour in Hankins, New York.
interesting points: The observer described the object as being oval-shaped and about the size of a car headlight (10-12 feet),The object exhibited unusual brightness, leading to the observation,The object was visible for one hour and moved very slowly,The object disappeared behind clouds and trees, A senior navigator identified the object as likely being the star Arcturus.
